attributes.action: Remove GREAT from GREAT BRITAIN as it's no longer a GREAT country to live in!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As the Government have allowed most of our Assets to be sold off! Why not sell off the Word Great!
If your White, British, Middle class, work hard, pay your stealth taxes -Youv'e had it!
Soon your taxes will be increasing to pay for everyone to go swimming for free!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
